code: import _ from'lodash';export var ENDPOINTS={POST_LOGIN:'/api/login',GET_CURRENT_ADMIN:'/api/admin/current',GET_ADMIN_ROLES:'/api/admin/roles',GET_ADMIN_ROLE:'/api/admin/role/:id',CREATE_ADMIN_ROLE:'/api/admin/role',GET_ADMIN_ACCOUNTS:'/api/admin/accounts',CREATE_ADMIN_ACCOUNT:'/api/admin/account',GET_ADMIN_ACCOUNT:'/api/admin/account/:id'};export var getApiUrl=function getApiUrl(endpoint,params){var path=endpoint;if(params){_.forEach(params,function(value,key){var replace=":".concat(key);if(path.indexOf(replace)!==-1){var re=new RegExp(replace,'g');path=path.replace(re,value.toString());}});}return path;};
